name: Ahamkara Scale
flavor: "And that Warlock thought I couldn't do it. Hah!"

name: Ankh of Sai Mota
flavor: //…a rattling shriek, the crunch of bones and the fading echoes of a brave woman's last laugh…//

name: Blood-Soaked Charm
flavor: To carry this charm is to fight for the lost world that fashioned it.

name: Butterfly Code
flavor: "Sensitive dependence between microfunctions," reads the inscription. Cryptarchs disagree on whether its origins are from the Vex or Golden Age Mars.

name: Coyote's Luck
flavor: A relic of the legendary Six Coyotes, the first Hunters to scout the Cosmodrome.

name: Dredgen Yor's Rose
flavor: "In his strong hand the man held a Rose. And his aura burned bright."

name: Efrideet's Eye
flavor: Every time she pulled the trigger, an enemy of the City died.

name: Filament Hex
flavor: A Hive totem woven and bound from filaments of the universe itself.

name: Fist of Eight Moons
flavor: Only in the Ascendant Plane—where a well-defended idea is a reality—do these moons, in this small way, still exist.

name: Hezen Totem
flavor: Can a machine change its ways? Any more or less than a human can?

name: Jasper Carcanet
flavor: I WAS MIDHA, CONSORT OF STARS. I WILL NOT BE FORGOTTEN.

name: Neural Bezoar
flavor: "Don't eat that!" "…Too late."

name: Pallas Ring
flavor: The Queen of the Reef commissioned these rings for each of the survivors of the Siege of Pallas.

name: Parasitic Optic
flavor: "Listen, I don't know how it works—I just know that it works, okay? No, I'm not worried."

name: Prismatic Heart
flavor: "You must learn to tease apart the hues of your own heart." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Rainbow Blade
flavor: The beauty of this sacrificial weapon belies the deadliness of its infinitesimally sharp edge.

name: The Maraid
flavor: The chronicle of Queen Mara Sov of the Awoken, compiled by the Primarchs of the Reef Cryptarchy.

name: The Pahanin Errata
flavor: The collected sayings, quips and observations by the legendary Hunter Pahanin.

name: Thrallskin Drum
flavor: A drum made from the skin of a Hive Thrall. Even when no one is playing it, you can always hear a faint beat.

name: Thrice-Wrapped Thing
flavor: Sure, try and unwrap it. I mean, what could possibly go wrong?

name: Trinary Star
flavor: "We were fools to trust this god-machine, this bringer of death and Darkness."

name: Two-Sided Coin
flavor: A Hunter doesn't leave anything to chance.

name: Unerring Compass
flavor: Its needle always points toward the Traveler.

name: Wax-Sealed Case
flavor: Definitely not made of wax. Probably actually a case, though.

name: SIVA Shard
flavor: This small fragment of SIVA tech hums with potential.

name: Perfected SIVA Shard
flavor: "It was inevitable Guardians would grab SIVA from off the field. Let's see what they do with it." —Shiro-4

name: Deidris's Fist
flavor: "I heard the Iron Lords' call. Here I am." —Lady Deidris

name: Oversoul's Scream
flavor: If you hold it to your ear and listen closely, you'll go deaf.

name: Oraclery
flavor: A moving mechanical model whose parts blink in and out of existence.

name: 0A0X Nightmask
flavor: Crucible variant. Custom sensorium by the buffalo_SOLDAT working group.

name: AOS#Cryptid
flavor: Crucible variant. The paramuscle lining breathes with you, like a second set of lungs.

name: Argus Deimatic
flavor: Deimatic armor radiates in every conceivable spectrum - a threat display, a battle hymn, and a taunt.

name: Aspriet
flavor: Crucible variant. Combines flexible fieldwire with tough fullerene plates.

name: Astrolord Vest
flavor: War is the struggle to exist. Everything real is a combatant.

name: ATS/8 Tarantella
flavor: Piezoweave induces controlled muscle spasms to improve combat performance.

name: Battuta
flavor: Even the driest desert was once a lush garden.

name: Blindsight Vest
flavor: "I shrouded myself so when the Light returned I could see it all the clearer." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Bog Wild
flavor: Just your bog-standard gear.

name: Brusilov
flavor: Unafraid to face the wild, uncharted void.

name: Carnivore Match
flavor: Artificial myofibers regulate respiration and heartbeat—or pump coolant for Exo users.

name: Cold Mantis
flavor: "People think that the law of the jungle is just selfish brutality. People haven't read the poem." - Pahanin

name: Corsair's Revenge
flavor: "They were Wolves in sheep's clothing. Now we're Awoken in Wolves' clothing." —Paladin Devi Cassl

name: Crest of Alpha Lupi
flavor: You've heard every last tale of the wolf by now. None of them are true. You are the wolf.

name: Cryptid
flavor: A delicately planed cuirass and hand-circuited wire all mark this armor as a labor of love.

name: Darkhollow Chiton
flavor: "Heartless and cruel is their realm—but in some ways more malleable than your own." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Vest
flavor: "Success is not about survival. It is about discovery." —Arach Modesta

name: Desolate Vest
flavor: Take your new shape.

name: Dustwalker
flavor: Shiftwire-lined and hardened shell armor designed for work in the Martian sands.

name: Elector's Heart
flavor: They will know you fight not for yourself, but for the people's will.

name: Exodus Vest
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: Fear Eater
flavor: "Are you afraid? Listen closely: so are they."

name: Forester
flavor: Simple plates and wire lining are enough to stop a Skiff's main guns - when charged with Light.

name: Ghost Angel
flavor: Triple-weaved rubber-plasm armor designed for silent motion.

name: Gravebreaker
flavor: Take what you need from the dead.

name: H_LD Starwinder
flavor: All H_LD patterns descend from a single source. No one knows where she went.

name: Harrowed Darkhollow Chiton
flavor: "Heartless and cruel is their realm—but in some ways more malleable than your own." —Eris Morn

name: Heart of the Justicar
flavor: The City is divided. We must unite beneath a single will.

name: Heart of the Order
flavor: The City is divided. We must unite beneath a single will.

name: Heliopause Vest
flavor: The Sun used to give us life. Now, staying near the Sun will be our doom.

name: Immanent War Vest
flavor: Conflict is the mother of reality.

name: Infinite Lines Vest
flavor: "I saw myself! Slaying the Darkness! That's what I saw!" —RECORD 344-CHASM-6872

name: Iron Breed Vest
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Companion Vest
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Vest
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Jackknife
flavor: Versatile gear for the discerning scout.

name: Kallipolis Vest
flavor: The City's ruler must be a warrior as well as a philosopher.

name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
flavor: I am a KALI-GNT WEARABLE BUNKER. I have a doctorate in terminal ballistics.

name: Kellhunter's Blood
flavor: The Servitors work the engines. The Archon plots the course. But it is the Kell who stands at the helm.

name: Komarov
flavor: Hunters craft Komarov patterns in preparation for lunar and exoatmospheric work.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "Was a time even Mars itself was the Queen's domain."

name: Lucky Raspberry
flavor: > No one has ever died wearing me. # It's true. She leaves the unworthy before they fall.

name: Mangala Skin
flavor: Mars was once a hostile, lifeless world. Now it's hostile and uncomfortably lively.

name: Neuroghast
flavor: Cytogel veins improve reflexes and senses while also heightening pain feedback for sharper awareness.

name: Prime Zealot Cuirass
flavor: Forged from the ruin of Hezen Vex armor. The sensory interface feels more natural than bare skin.

name: Prototype
flavor: Your Ghost built this wire armor from available mass. It handles life support, but little else.

name: Queen's Guard Vest
flavor: An Awoken relic from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Raku Vindicator
flavor: The Raku workshop tweaks high-end armor for Crucible competition.

name: Relentless Harness
flavor: The splayed claws and empty skull of a Thrall cry defiance to the Hive.

name: Rogue
flavor: Most Hunters favor a light plate cuirass over the field wire underweave.

name: Rustburner
flavor: Many Hunters incorporate field drivers and other Titan plate components into their gear.

name: Sanction Custom
flavor: Trends develop in the ecosystem of custom armor. Crucible gear runs hot and burns out fast.

name: Sanction Six
flavor: Field-tested tactical rig plated with the alloys of ancient combat aircraft.

name: Sinaa Jaguar
flavor: Someone stripped the lining of insulation, as if they wanted the wearer to be sore and angry.

name: Sinaa Lamprey
flavor: Pressure-responsive fabric lets Hunters thrive in any gravity.

name: Snakeline
flavor: As Hunters grow more experienced, they begin rewiring their armor inspired by Light.

name: Sojourn Vest
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Stratus
flavor: Alpine requirements go hand-in-hand with pilot specs: light, low-profile, with excellent life support.

name: Takanome Ranger
flavor: Armed with sniper rifles, Takanome's Rangers gave cover to countless City-bound refugees." —Chiyoko Mey

name: Tracker
flavor: Field wire stiffens on impact, converting enemy gunfire into heat, shrapnel, and bruises.

name: Vaquero
flavor: Sparrow up, partner.

name: Vermilion Stripe
flavor: For many Hunters, grief and vengeance are one and the same.

name: Vest of No Tomorrow
flavor: War is the struggle to exist. Everything real is a combatant.

name: Vest of the Exile
flavor: "Let the heat melt your body so your soul might flow with the river of time." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Vest of the Iron Lords
flavor: "I welcome every challenge, for it only makes me stronger." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Vest of the Pariah
flavor: "I welcome every challenge, for it only makes me stronger." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Warden's Blood
flavor: "Taken are trouble… if they've got someone like Oryx calling the shots. On their own, they're kinda stupid." —Cayde-6

name: Watchers' Vest
flavor: "'Out of sight, out of mind,' they say. The Speaker wishes this was true." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Winged Sun Vest
flavor: "Like a meteor burning until nothing is left but the idea of a Light." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Wolf Pelt Weave
flavor: "With some Reef improvements, this armor works better for me than it did for its previous owner."

name: Raku Poltergeist 2.0
flavor: Crucible Variant. Modified by the Raku group to meet Lord Shaxx's rigorous standards.

name: KD Bogatyr 2.0
flavor: "I don't even care if it's a true story. S'long as it's good, I'm a happy Hunter." —Cayde-6

name: High Command Vest
flavor: Power is not a gift. It is a calling.

name: Eon Tracer Vest
flavor: "Eternities streamed past me, like shooting stars…" —RECORD-449-CHASM-6887

name: Endling Vest
flavor: We are the last of our species.

name: Nanomania Vest
flavor: We've found a way to push our matter encryption technology even further. ~SIVA.MEM.WB002

name: Lion's Vigil Vest
flavor: "If you wish to learn the ways of war, look around you." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Iron Saga Vest
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Dream-Eater Vest
flavor: A Warlock riddle: What is a Hunter's least favorite place to go? Answer: To sleep.

name: Days of Iron Hauberk
flavor: "When we feared the sun would ne'er on heroes rise again, whose deeds began the new Days of Iron?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Heart of Triumph
flavor: A brave heart, bold as griffins, beats beneath this armor.

name: All My Victims Cloak
flavor: Made from the torn cloaks of other Hunters. Other, lesser Hunters.

name: AOS#Cryptid Cloak
flavor: "Out there? All that is a job. Here, in the Crucible - this is a life."

name: Arc Flayer Mantle
flavor: A mantle of woven Arc energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Kolar.

name: Aspriet Cloak
flavor: "Fly high. Strike hard. Repeat." —Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Astrolord Cloak
flavor: History's lords have ever painted the future in tones of fire and shadow.

name: Ayane Takanome's Cloak
flavor: Ayane Takanome was no Guardian, but the City still remembers how she and her Rangers secured the refugee roads.

name: Bladedancer's Cloak
flavor: "These blades…they're an extension of your arm, your reflexes, your Light."

name: Bloodstained Hood
flavor: "Those Jaguar militant types seem a little extreme." —a person of inadequate ferocity

name: Brawler's Cloak
flavor: Hunters may be averse to centralized organization, but nothing is more fearsome than a coordinated stalk.

name: Buckaroo's Cloak
flavor: Meanwhile, back at the ranch...

name: Chaos Cloak
flavor: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

name: Cloak of Atropos
flavor: One boast goes, "When Cabal see my cloak, they flee." Another goes, 'Look at all these dead Cabal!'

name: Cloak of Desolation
flavor: Shield yourself from the night.

name: Cloak of Dredgen Yor
flavor: Before he took Pahanin's Light, Dredgen Yor ruled the Crucible, the notorious Thorn at his side.

name: Cloak of Hidden Agendas
flavor: "Tell a Titan only a madman would go. Tell a Warlock it's too complex." - Pahanin Errata

name: Cloak of Immanent War
flavor: A new dawn breaks. Feel how it burns.

name: Cloak of Keen Eyes
flavor: "My ancestors were born beyond the Walls, on the long march to the City."

name: Cloak of No Tomorrow
flavor: Tomorrow will be as yesterday was. There will always be a battle to be won.

name: Cloak of Oblivion
flavor: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

name: Cloak of Order
flavor: The City prospers on our field of order and justice.

name: Cloak of Perception
flavor: "Have you walked the ruins? Seen the machines born from the lightning? We face a mighty foe."

name: Cloak of Ragged Fortune
flavor: Sometimes a Hunter will lose a cloak in a bet. It's poor form to replace it right away.

name: Cloak of Repair
flavor: We'll carve our future through the will of the people.

name: Cloak of Reverence
flavor: The stylized twin arc represents the world beneath the Traveler.

name: Cloak of Seven Bones
flavor: "Let this bone I reaped in battle give me strength to reap again."

name: Cloak of Solitude
flavor: The tattered remnants of a lost veteran's cloak, handed down as a reminder and a warning.

name: Cloak of Taniks
flavor: He of the endless troves of arms, and legs, and hearts, and lungs, and…

name: Cloak of Tekmor
flavor: When an old Hunter wears a simple cloak, ask yourself where she got it, and what the cloth remembers.

name: Cloak of the Apsides
flavor: "The Hunter creed calls us outward. And what do we find out there? Hard vacuum. Respect it."

name: Cloak of the Cosmonaut
flavor: Vladimir Komarov helped build and fly Earth's first ships. He gave his life to the frontier.

name: Cloak of the Dusktorn
flavor: "I'll remember the Light. Will it remember me?" - Sai Mota

name: Cloak of the Exile
flavor: "Was he exiled? Did he leave willingly? Was the parting angry? Peaceful? Is he dead? Alive? In a word: yes." —Sister Faora

name: Cloak of the Exodus
flavor: Find the way.

name: Cloak of the Hidden
flavor: "The shadows dance quickly among the dust. Make them your ally." - Eris

name: Cloak of the Ironsworn
flavor: "Those who find victory in the Crucible will win salvation for our City." - Iron Banner maxim

name: Cloak of the Justicars
flavor: In pursuit of the City's safety, our jurisdiction is unlimited.

name: Cloak of the Leopard
flavor: Legend says that no animal was more difficult to hunt than the leopard.

name: Cloak of the Mantis
flavor: "Patient camouflage and precise violence. No wonder they survived."

name: Cloak of the Pariah
flavor: "I wear his symbols proudly in the City, to remind them that Osiris is not truly gone." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Cloak of the Reefrunners
flavor: "The child asked me if the Awoken were blue because they were cold. Then he called my cloak a blanket."

name: Cloak of the Rising
flavor: The New Monarchy is the aegis that guards humanity.

name: Cloak of the Shadowjacks
flavor: Twilight Gap highlighted the desperate need for proactive strikes to keep the enemy off balance.

name: Cloak of the Shadowsmiths
flavor: "It's already being handled." - Cayde-6, in an emergency session of the City Consensus

name: Cloak of the Sixth Reign
flavor: One throne beneath the howling dark.

name: Cloak of the Skypillar
flavor: Some suggest Saint-14's legendary vigil was enabled by a few roaming Hunters and their bloody culls.

name: Cloak of the Sojourn
flavor: The stars are calling.

name: Cloak of the Unborn
flavor: "Child asked me if I was a clock. I told her yes. I was keeping time until the world would be safe for her."

name: Cloak of the Unfactorable
flavor: "Could the Vex build a model of us? A simulated City, a whole simulated Earth, adrift in the ocean of the Vex intellect?"

name: Cloak of the Unflinching
flavor: Anyone who takes the pathway into orbit will never want to leave it. Challenge the universe.

name: Cloud Walker Tribute
flavor: A cloak which bears the emblem of the Cloud Walkers, the pioneers of the first Exodus.

name: Competitor Match
flavor: "Instinct tells you to cherish victory, but defeat holds all the lessons." —Lord Shaxx

name: Cosmic Joke
flavor: An infamous cloak, scavenged off the corpses of its owners numerous times on the frontier.

name: Cult/Trinary Star
flavor: The mark of the Trinary Star, the hidden cult who curse the Traveler's light.

name: Darkhollow Mantle
flavor: "To even exist in their space is to constantly demand your own existence." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Cloak
flavor: "Beyond the Reef. Beyond the Nine." —Arach Jalaal

name: Dead Zone Revolution
flavor: With each Dead Zone charted comes a new cloak pattern from the Hunter elite.

name: Devils' Cloak
flavor: "There are some bargains worthy of any risk."

name: Devils' Disguise
flavor: Hide your face.

name: Drifter's Cloak
flavor: Cut from City textile and worn as a mark of pride by Hunters with big dreams.

name: Dustwalker Cloak
flavor: A good survival cape can be used as a hull patch, bandage, tourniquet, pressure seal, picnic blanket...

name: Dynamo Cloak
flavor: "Your missions: protect the City. Look better than Warlocks. But don't look like you're trying." - Pahanin Errata

name: End Unsung
flavor: A humble cloak worn in tribute to the Guardians who met their end alone in the wild.

name: Extropic Cloak
flavor: "Child came for our robes today. He said the Awoken Hunters needed them, as they were cold." —Warlock doorlog

name: Fieldcraft Hood
flavor: Even vacuum-ready field wire armor should be kept out of the rain. Rig a hood.

name: Fixer Cloak
flavor: I solve problems.

name: Frumious Cloak
flavor: Tell the Warlocks your cloak is frabjous. They respect words they don't understand.

name: Ghost Angel Cloak
flavor: We are an army of the chosen dead.

name: Grinder's Cloak
flavor: "First, check your cloak for damage. Second, inspect yourself for major wounds." - Handbook of (Un)Controversial Advice

name: Gunslinger's Cloak
flavor: In the dark days before the Last City, all a Hunter had was the Light and a steady aim.

name: H_LD Starwinder Cloak
flavor: As the cloak frays, it reveals the ancient works of Li Qingzhao, carved in chips of bone.

name: Harbinger Hood
flavor: A pattern inspired by the legendary Awoken weapon.

name: Hardcase Cloak
flavor: If you learn nothing else, learn this: when a Hunter takes up the cloak of a dead comrade, this is a vow.

name: Heliopause Cloak
flavor: "Once, deep space explorers were seen as heroes. Now, for suggesting humanity should look beyond this system, some call us cowards." —Arach Parnell

name: Highest Squidder
flavor: "Are you squidding me?"

name: Hood of the Night Sun
flavor: "I am not a dashing rogue. I am not a free spirit. I am a claw in the throat of the dark, and I will draw blood."

name: Hood of the Spawn
flavor: "Toland cracked the rune, or led us to believe he did. I told him it was either that, or the Hive have a hell of a recipe for beer." - Omar Agah

name: Hustler's Cloak
flavor: They say you will never find an impractical Hunter. But what do 'they' know about dashing cloaks?

name: Infinite Lines Cloak
flavor: ...pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Iron Camelot Cloak
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Gheleon, he who was a true Guardian to the people.

name: Journey Hood
flavor: It's not the destination that matters.

name: Kallipolis Mantle
flavor: The leader we need is among us, not above us.

name: Kell's Cloak
flavor: "Here's my plan to be Kell. Fallen seem to respect violence and big capes. I'm really violent, and I found this cape."

name: Kellhunter's Hood
flavor: The strongest lead the pack.

name: Kings' Cloak
flavor: "Of which world? All of them."

name: Kings' Mantle
flavor: Fit for royalty.

name: Lead Scout's Cloak
flavor: "To clear mines: step on mine. Wait for Ghost revival. Step on mine 2. Wait for Ghost. Step on - "

name: Legend of Six Coyotes
flavor: A cloak fashioned after the legendary Hunters who first scouted beyond the Cosmodrome wall.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "You didn't tell me this treasure was in the red mists of Murmuring Rock. Count me out."

name: Makeshift Scarf
flavor: The Hunter's cloak speaks to their personality. Your Ghost scrounged up this tough synthetic wrap, marked with an ancient double-headed eagle.

name: Mantle of Efrideet
flavor: Stand in the fire until there is nothing left to burn away.

name: Mantle of Gheleon
flavor: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

name: Mantle of Perun
flavor: Your mark be made, by thunder's crack or lightning's strike.

name: Mantle of Sublime Light
flavor: A trial by fire, the purpose of which is transformation.

name: Maverick's Cloak
flavor: "Bright colors are Mother Nature's way of saying 'don't mess with me.' We like a lot of her ideas."

name: Melting Point
flavor: In the Crucible, you'll find yours.

name: Nagari Cloak
flavor: In this age of Light and fire, simple skills still endure. Hunters embroider signs of war and loss on their cloaks.

name: Neuroghast Cloak
flavor: To control your opponents, you must first control your own body.

name: Night Rain Cloak
flavor: Hunters constantly tweak and upgrade their armor. A cloak is the best mark of recognition.

name: Nightmask Cloak
flavor: "They say the Crucible is preparation for the frontier. I see it the other way around." - Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Nightstalker Cloak
flavor: Live and die by the draw of a bow.

name: Nightstalker's Cloak
flavor: "We are the rangers, the keen-eyed scouts who stalk the Darkness where it dwells."

name: Not A Fallen Hood
flavor: Friendly fire is as deadly as any Fallen skiff, so some Hunters choose cloaks for pure visibility.

name: Octopus Cloak
flavor: "If human extinction seems imminent, try to relax. You're just giving cephalopods a shot." - Pahanin Errata

name: On the Marsh
flavor: Swamp camouflage is the hottest fashion these days.

name: Ones and Zeroes
flavor: Maybe that's all we really are.

name: Pennant Cloak
flavor: Guardians often band together and form close-knit teams to achieve victory in the Crucible.

name: Pilgrim's Cloak
flavor: How many fell on the road to the City? How few made the last leg of the journey with a Ghost over their shoulders?

name: Pleiades Hood
flavor: The enemy sees beyond visual light, so cloth camouflage is difficult. No sense looking drab.

name: Quantum-Phoenix Blue
flavor: A pattern born from waveform flux in the probability kilns of the City.

name: Queen's Arrow
flavor: City artists created this pattern to honor the Queen of the Awoken.

name: Racer's Scarf
flavor: All your rivals will see are your contrails in the distance.

name: Red Eclipse Cloak
flavor: Still we shine.

name: Rihla Mantle
flavor: The City is hungry for tales of your exploits.

name: Rustworn Cloak
flavor: It's been stained and torn by old metal. But whatever it went through, it survived.

name: Shattered Vault Cloak
flavor: The machines are not invincible.

name: Shroud of Flies
flavor: They gather where death steps.

name: Silent Specter
flavor: We linger in the wild, stalking and exploring without a sound.

name: Solar Flayer Mantle
flavor: A mantle of woven Solar energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Vatch.

name: Spektar Aspriet Cloak
flavor: "Fly high. Strike hard. Repeat." —Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Spektar Cloak
flavor: More than one color stains the battlefield.

name: Spektar Heliopause Cloak
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Spektar Infinite Cloak
flavor: …pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Spektar Kallipolis Cloak
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Squid Pro Quo
flavor: "Yes, my love for cephalopods is well documented." —Pahanin Errata

name: Strength of the Pack
flavor: A pattern worn by Ana Bray during the fateful battle of the Twilight Gap.

name: Takanome Ranger's Hood
flavor: In the darkest days of the Dark Age, camouflage was our only defense.

name: The Ishtar Dilemma
flavor: Never did answer Sundaresh's question, now did we?

name: Tracker's Wrap
flavor: This cut-down cloak marks the bearer as a rising Hunter, newly reborn and eager to roam.

name: Trailblazer's Hood
flavor: You're the first! At least, the first to live to tell about it.

name: Unbelievably Old Cloak
flavor: Look at all that...character.

name: Vaquero's Cloak
flavor: Never did like being in one place for too long.

name: Venom of Ikaheka
flavor: The sigil of the snake, said to represent the fluid lethality of a true Hunter.

name: Void Flayer Mantle
flavor: A mantle of woven Void energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Numoc.

name: Warden's Hood
flavor: "I always target Taken Psions first. That way I use one bullet instead of 20." —Cayde-6

name: Wetwork Cloak
flavor: [this passage intentionally redacted]

name: Wolfswood Cloak
flavor: In our darkest hour, nine Iron Wolves emerged from the ruins.

name: Wolves' Cloak
flavor: "Run with me, we've new trails to stalk."

name: Nanomania Cloak
flavor: Habitats, equipment, repairs of all kinds—all of these things can be made from one material. ~SIVA.MEM.WB003

name: Cloak of Fast Resolve
flavor: "Don't second-guess yourself." —Ain Suhu-ässä

name: Novgorod Cloak
flavor: "A Hunter back from a quest? Now that's the best storyteller in the galaxy." —Cayde-6

name: Eon Tracer Cloak
flavor: "We trace the history of war throughout the ages." —Lakshmi-2

name: High Command Cloak
flavor: "The City demands a leader. Now, before it is too late." —Executor Hideo

name: Endling Cloak
flavor: "I am haunted by the Endling, the last living human." —Arach Jalaal

name: Idylls of the Iron Lords
flavor: "The tale of the Iron Lords is not over." —Lord Saladin Forge

name: Iron Saga Cloak
flavor: "The worlds still need the Iron Lords." —Lord Saladin

name: Lion's Vigil Cloak
flavor: "When we hunt together, we cannot fail." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Cloak of Legends
flavor: The cloak of a Hunter who's seen and done it all and lived to tell the tale.

name: 0A0X Nightmask
flavor: Crucible variant. Cut down and regraphed for agility.

name: Acolyte Rung
flavor: "Mota was so close -- clawing her way out with bones torn from the Acolytes. Her fall -- Omnigul. You honor her." - Eris

name: AOS#Cryptid
flavor: Crucible variant. Activated polymer will self-shape to grip your favorite knife.

name: Argus Deimatic
flavor: The coil complex on the left gauntlet may experience alarming mass fluctuations.

name: Aspriet
flavor: Crucible variant. Fieldweave grafted for strong, accurate throws.

name: Astrolord Grips
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: Battuta
flavor: Some of the City's best-selling authors are Hunters-turned-travel writers.

name: Blindsight Sleeves
flavor: "With the sight, I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Bog Wild
flavor: Try not to get bogged down with the little things.

name: Brusilov
flavor: One part curiosity, one part obligation, two parts reckless pride.

name: Carnivore Match
flavor: It's all in the execution.

name: Cold Mantis
flavor: "Your job on the fireteam is to answer the question 'Can we kill that thing?' Make sure the answer is always yes."

name: Corsair's Revenge
flavor: "During the Hildian Campaign, modified Fallen armor was more common among the Reef troops than the standard issue."

name: Cryptid
flavor: The lovingly crafted Cryptid family includes a kinematically charged joint massager - on every finger!

name: Darkhollow Grasps
flavor: "All the vastness of our universe is but a blank page on which they scrawl their words of hate and death." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Grips
flavor: "At least we'll know we tried." —Arach Henri

name: Desolate Grips
flavor: More than shadows, but less than starstuff.

name: Dogged Gage
flavor: One doesn't need sleeves to keep knives inside them.

name: Don't Touch Me
flavor: Amputated from a creature that stumbled out of a Vex gate. A vestigial defensive reflex still remains.

name: Dustwalker
flavor: Shiftwire can induce nerve activity. It makes mere skin feel like dead plastic.

name: Elector's Grips
flavor: True power comes from the hands of the people.

name: Exodus Grips
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Fear Eater
flavor: Stay at the top of the food chain.

name: Forester
flavor: The wilderness reclaimed Earth after the Collapse. Now Hunters reclaim the wilderness.

name: Ghost Angel
flavor: As we climbed the tern cliffs he moved their nests aside, real gently. At the top he strangled the Fallen sentry. Same hands."

name: Gravebreaker
flavor: Careful around the upholstery.

name: Grips of No Tomorrow
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: H_LD Starwinder
flavor: The trigger action is the central action, and so it must feel euphoric.

name: Harrowed Darkhollow Grasps
flavor: "All the vastness of our universe is but a blank page on which they scrawl their words of hate and death." —Eris Morn

name: Heliopause Grips
flavor: "We are not fatalists. We're optimists. We believe life exists beyond this dead orbit." —Arach Linde

name: Immanent War Grips
flavor: Tomorrow will not be easily tamed.

name: Infinite Lines Grips
flavor: "I saw three queens. No, two. No...just one." —RECORD 351-CHASM-6915

name: Iron Breed Sleeves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Grips
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Perun, she who hunted the Darkness where it dwelt.

name: Iron Companion Sleeves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Sleeves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Jackknife
flavor: Micro-collectors absorb ambient moisture.

name: Justicar's Grips
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
flavor: I am a KALI-GNT AGGRESSIVE HANDSHAKE. Pleased to meet you.

name: Kallipolis Grips
flavor: We cannot win the war beyond our walls without first winning the people within them.

name: Kellhunter's Rally
flavor: The Kell's first command is a word. If the word goes unheeded, the Kell's second command is the blade.

name: Khepri's Sting
flavor: The wound is not deep, but you know it exists—and that is enough.

name: Komarov
flavor: The gauntlets include extensible microtools for fine work on spacecraft systems.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "All the way to Venus I tracked her. But in the jungles of the Ishtar Sink the trail vanished."

name: Mangala Skin
flavor: Mars is far, far out. Light crawls across the gap from the City. Hunters respect that isolation.

name: Neuroghast
flavor: Though compatible with organic humanoids, Neuroghast armor was optimized for prosthetic or Exo limbs.

name: Order's Grip
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: Prime Zealot Gloves
flavor: Forged from the remnants of broken Vex. Some of the component matter is older than the solar system.

name: Prototype
flavor: Your Ghost built this wire armor from available mass. It handles life support, but little else.

name: Queen's Guard Grips
flavor: The hand of the throne.

name: Raku Vindicator
flavor: Leather flash conceals an exquisite self-aligning coil pattern.

name: Rogue
flavor: A pauldron-mounted transceiver helps Hunters and their Ghosts stay in touch with their ships.

name: Rustburner
flavor: The gauntlets include a dedicated proprioceptor net for knife work.

name: Sanction Custom
flavor: In combat, every motion must be mindless and perfect.

name: Sanction Six
flavor: Some Hunters boast of things they find. We boast of places we fly.

name: Sealed Ahamkara's Grasps
flavor: Plating the Ahamkara bones in silver helps to quiet the auditory hallucinations...oh bearer mine.

name: Shinobu's Vow
flavor: "No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes

name: Sinaa Jaguar
flavor: The wire in these gloves has been tweaked to grow warm when your knife pierces enemy hide.

name: Sinaa Lamprey
flavor: Slippery as an eel.

name: Sleeves of the Iron Lords
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Sleeves of the Pariah
flavor: "They cast him out. But his words never left." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Snakeline
flavor: "The black gloves are tough, menacing and—I swear—make you unbeatable at Go." —Pahanin Errata

name: Sojourn Grips
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Stratus
flavor: A Hunter's armor must be nimble, tough, and wearable - because it will be their only home.

name: Takanome Ranger
flavor: "In the Dark Age, before the safety of the City, before the rise of the Tower, there were only the Rangers." —Chiyoko Mey

name: Tracker
flavor: Wire armor is light and flexible, perfect for silent motion and cramped conditions.

name: Vaquero
flavor: Howdy.

name: Vermilion Stripe
flavor: The vermilion stripe is a Hunter mark of mourning.

name: Warden's Rally
flavor: "That Prison holds nothing that does not want to be there. Knowing that, ask yourself, 'Why do the Taken stay?'" —Eris Morn

name: Watchers' Grips
flavor: "The watcher does not just observe. The watcher defines the observed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Winged Sun Sleeves
flavor: "Those who fly beneath the Sun do not come back unscathed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Wolf Pelt Weave
flavor: "In the Reef, you use what you can find, even if all you can find is Fallen."

name: Young Ahamkara's Spine
flavor: Give me your arm, oh bearer mine. Let me help you fill the world with teeth.

name: Raku Poltergeist 2.0
flavor: Crucible variant. Interlaced with Jormungand coil favored by Warlocks.

name: KD Bogatyr 2.0
flavor: "Just come back with a good story, y'hear?" —Cayde-6

name: High Command Grips
flavor: Your deeds speak for themselves.

name: Eon Tracer Gloves
flavor: "I can never find the beginning, the place where the path forks." —RECORD 448-CHASM-6808

name: Endling Grasps
flavor: We cannot let the lineage end with us.

name: Nanomania Grasps
flavor: Let's get right to it. How can Clovis Bray help the Exodus project? ~SIVA.MEM.CL001

name: Mongrel Ogre's Grasps
flavor: "Enemy of my enemy, I guess. Still, never thought we'd find ourselves here." —Shiro-4

name: Lion's Vigil Grips
flavor: "Step forward, if you think you can challenge me." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Iron Saga Grips
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Dream-Eater Grasps
flavor: Hunters suffer insomnia at far higher rates than other Guardians—even Exos.

name: Days of Iron Grips
flavor: "When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Shinobu's Vow
flavor: "No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes

name: Grasps of Triumph
flavor: The glory you've fought for rests in your hands.

name: 0A0X Nightmask
flavor: Crucible variant. Fieldwire density and peak rise exceeds safe long-term standards.

name: Achlyophage Symbiote
flavor: "They told me it would eat my thoughts and leave me full of Light."

name: AOS#Cryptid
flavor: Crucible variant. Rebreather comes with optional vaporized adrenaline.

name: Argus Deimatic
flavor: Patterned by a grizzled Hunter and a Praxic Warlock, this remarkable armor records everything for later analysis.

name: Aspriet
flavor: Crucible variant. The nanowire mesh shields the oxygen filters from unwanted particulates.

name: Astrolord Cover
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: ATS/8 ARACHNID
flavor: Advanced tactical sensorium. Induced hallucinations integrate broad-spectrum targeting data.

name: Battuta
flavor: The first Hunters were also the first mapmakers. Every Guardian owes them a debt.

name: Bog Wild
flavor: Learn the swamp's secrets. Keep the swamp's secrets. Lie awake at night, horrified by the swamp's secrets.

name: Bright Shield
flavor: Protection from the slings and arrows of life, but not much else.

name: Brusilov
flavor: Every Hunter leaves the City knowing it could be for the last time.

name: Burning Eye Mask
flavor: "There are eyes beyond our eyes. Lamps of nothingness, voids of brightness." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Carnivore Match
flavor: Rawr.

name: Celestial Nighthawk
flavor: Starlight is your guide. No vacuum will contain you.

name: Circuit Defender
flavor: A clever Guardian knows which gates to pass through and which ones to pass by.

name: Cold Mantis
flavor: "Don't let your pride kill you. When you see a thorny target, call for a team. Consider them an audience, if that helps."

name: Corsair's Revenge
flavor: Possession of Fallen armor has become a point of pride among the Reef Corsairs.

name: Cover of No Tomorrows
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Cover of the Exile
flavor: "Don't you find it strange that the one called The Speaker rarely has anything useful to say?" —Sayings of the Disciples

name: Cryptid
flavor: Seek out other Guardians when the howling loneliness grows too deep. Pretend it's a chance meeting, though.

name: Cultist's Cover
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Darkhollow Mask
flavor: "The Dreadnaught is a blighted hollow gouged into our Universe." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Cover
flavor: "Listen. Some stars won't stop calling to us." —Arach Linde

name: Desolate Cover
flavor: A smell of ozone. A distant scream. A feeling of dread.

name: Dustwalker
flavor: Titan and a Hunter crash on Mars. Titan's helmet stops a Cabal slug. Hunter's helmet stops her from starving. Who lives?

name: Elector's Mask
flavor: Hide your face, but let your voice be heard.

name: Exodus Cover
flavor: Travel the wilderness and master it. This is our salvation.

name: Fear Eater
flavor: When I wear the mask I am a machine, the purpose of which is consumption.

name: Forester
flavor: Shielded optics and an armored rebreather for long-duration sorties into the wild.

name: Ghost Angel
flavor: "Shake it off. We've all been dead before."

name: Gravebreaker
flavor: Custom sensorium. Superb respirator. Terrifying visage.

name: Graviton Forfeit
flavor: "Doesn't matter how good you are—you stay out there too long, you're not coming back. Not the same way you left, anyway." —Tevis

name: H_LD Starwinder
flavor: This helmet will keep you happy. Why shouldn't you be happy?

name: Harrowed Darkhollow Mask
flavor: "The Dreadnaught is a blighted hollow gouged into our Universe." —Eris Morn

name: Heliopause Mask
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Helm of the Jade Rabbit
flavor: Ancient technology repurposed for the modern Guardian.

name: Hood of Malok
flavor: It's like they say: Pride goeth before the fall.

name: Infinite Lines Mask
flavor: "I saw Darkness. No Light, no Earth, no air. Only Darkness. I...I can't breathe..." —RECORD 342-CHASM-6827

name: Iron Breed Mask
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Casque
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Efrideet, she whose keen eye never missed her mark.

name: Iron Companion Mask
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Mask
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Jackknife
flavor: "I inhaled eight times lethal dose. Tasted like a spring picnic. Good respirator."

name: Justicar's Mask
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
flavor: I am a KALI-GNT SKULL MOUNT. Let us find prey.

name: Kallipolis Mask
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Kellhunter's Sight
flavor: A Kell's authority is like that of a sniper. You can't see everything, but as long as they believe you can…"

name: Knucklehead Radar
flavor: You can see the point, right? Who wants to team up with one?

name: Komarov
flavor: Never lose your bearings. A disoriented Hunter cannot select vital targets or track lines of flight.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "Some of 'em survived. I know a fellow says he saw a wish dragon on Jupiter a ways back."

name: Mangala Skin
flavor: Success depends on meticulous preparation. Scour-proof your visors and rig backup sensors, or risk fighting blind.

name: Mantic Zealot Helm
flavor: Forged from the cores of Hezen Vex. If you feel a sense of revelation, remove immediately and inject antientheogens.

name: Mask of Immanent War
flavor: Every horizon hides a war as old as time.

name: Mask of the Iron Lords
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Mask of the Pariah
flavor: The sun must set before it will rise again." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Mask of the Third Man
flavor: It wasn't me. It was the Third Man."

name: Momentum Helmet
flavor: Victory is in sight.

name: Neuroghast
flavor: Embedded neural nodes improve the biological connections between mind and body.

name: Oblivion Cover
flavor: Travel the wilderness and master it. This is our salvation.

name: Order's Mask
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Prime Zealot Helm
flavor: Forged from the cores of Hezen Vex. If you feel a sense of revelation, remove immediately and inject antientheogens.

name: Prototype
flavor: Your Ghost built this wire armor from available mass. It handles life support, but little else.

name: Queen's Guard Mask
flavor: Show me all that I have yet to rule."

name: Racing Helmet
flavor: Crash resistant and fashion forward.

name: Raku Vindicator
flavor: Four-quadrant battlefield dominance.

name: Rogue
flavor: Do Hunters abide by the law of the City? Better to ask: in the wilderness, is there law beyond the Hunter?

name: Rustburner
flavor: Hunters who stalk the trackless wastes of Mars need armor designed to handle the scouring sand and cold.

name: Sanction Custom
flavor: Nerve telemetry goes to a GNT study group working to understand the neural correlates of triumph.

name: Sanction Six
flavor: Twilight Gap changed things.

name: Sinaa Jaguar
flavor: Sensory interfaces are a stock component of Hunter gear, but they are rarely tuned so raw.

name: Sinaa Lamprey
flavor: Fast-cycling oxygen filters keep the air crisp and fresh.

name: Skyburners Annex
flavor: "To die twice in a strange land: first by Oryx's hand, then by yours."

name: Snakeline
flavor: All Guardians channel Light. But Hunters insist they bring a certain flair to it.

name: Sojourn Cover
flavor: Travel the wilderness and master it. This is our salvation.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Stratus
flavor: Descended from an aerospace design, the optics and sensorium provide excellent awareness.

name: Stratus White
flavor: Some generous Hunter donated this helmet for the use of newly reborn Hunters.

name: Takanome Ranger
flavor: Eventually the Guardians took over for the Rangers. Now some say Ayane Takanome was a myth all along." —Chiyoko Mey

name: The Waiting Crown
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Tracker
flavor: This basic helmet offers a closed rebreather and a decent internal sensorium.

name: Unyielding Casque
flavor: The weak will be consumed.

name: Vaquero
flavor: Just my rifle, my Sparrow, and me.

name: Vermilion Stripe
flavor: A single mark painted upon the forehead in remembrance of a lost comrade.

name: Warden's Sight
flavor: "Watch your enemies, Guardian. Study. Judge. Learn." —Variks

name: Wolf Pelt Weave
flavor: "Took some work to get their helmets pumping oxygen. Never did get the Fallen stench out, though."

name: Lion's Vigil Mask
flavor: "We watch, and we wait. And we train." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Iron Saga Mask
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Days of Iron Crown
flavor: "When the Last of Lords unfurled the Banner once again, who took up arms to march beneath it?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Raku Poltergeist 2.0
flavor: Crucible variant. Now less likely to decouple neural connections.

name: KD Bogatyr 2.0
flavor: "I need you to take this seriously, y'hear? Cause then I don't have to." —Cayde-6

name: High Command Mask
flavor: This is the face of justice.

name: Eon Tracer Mask
flavor: "It's too much… Turn it off… Let me out!" —RECORD-449-CHASM-6263

name: Endling Mask
flavor: We will only be extinct when the last of us is gone.

name: Nanomania Mask
flavor: SIVA doesn't expire, degrade, or forget. It can remain dormant even on long voyages. ~SIVA.MEM.WB004

name: Dream-Eater Mask
flavor: "Of what do Hunters dream? The places they've never been."

name: Mask of Triumph
flavor: You've seen every planet and stared into the Darkness. And you live.

name: 0A0X Nightmask
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: AOS#Cryptid
flavor: Crucible variant. The treads know how to grip more than forty thousand terrain types.

name: Argus Deimatic
flavor: The armor-mounted transceiver antennae will happily double as melee weapons.

name: Aspriet
flavor: Crucible variant. Lightweight kinematic supports give wearers the sensation of flying.

name: Astrolord Boots
flavor: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

name: Battuta
flavor: The first Hunters walked where no human had set foot for hundreds of years.

name: Blindsight Legs
flavor: "The courage to walk into the Darkness, but strength to return to the Light." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Bog Wild
flavor: Feel the swamp. Smell the swamp. Be the swamp.

name: Bones of Eao
flavor: Defy extinction.

name: Boots of No Tomorrow
flavor: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

name: Boots of the Exile
flavor: "Many followed him when he left—if not with their feet, then with their hearts." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Boots of the Iron Lords
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Brusilov
flavor: We will find the way.

name: Carnivore Match
flavor: The Lotka-Volterra equations describe the relationship between the world and you.

name: Cold Mantis
flavor: Scarce materials and labor make it impossible to produce high-end armor in bulk.

name: Corsair's Revenge
flavor: "Wearing Fallen armor reminds me of the Fallen I killed to get it. Good times."

name: Cryptid
flavor: Autonomy is a Hunter's watchword. Far from the City, you must be swift, bold, and decisive.

name: Darkhollow Treads
flavor: "Even now, the Daughters of Oryx weave black words of blight to bind his realm to ours." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Boots
flavor: "When all is shadow, know your journey has begun." —Arach Parnell

name: Desolate Legs
flavor: Transformation is not always revelation.

name: Dustwalker
flavor: Martian dust storms erupt across the entire planet. For a Hunter, they're an opportunity to move in stealth.

name: Elector's Boots
flavor: Our footfalls forge the path to a new age.

name: Exodus Boots
flavor: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

name: Fear Eater
flavor: No one's impervious to psychological warfare. Even the Vex develop reactions to certain foes.

name: Forester
flavor: Sparrows burn. Ships crash. The wise Hunter knows machines will fail, and makes ready to walk.

name: Fr0st-EE5
flavor: "Hey, if it works for computers..." —Marcus Ren

name: Ghost Angel
flavor: "We tracked the Fallen across the library floor, through drifts of paper and ash. The silence was magnificent."

name: Gravebreaker
flavor: In and out of the jaws of death.

name: H_LD Starwinder
flavor: Take joy in motion.

name: Harrowed Darkhollow Treads
flavor: "Even now, the Daughters of Oryx weave black words of blight to bind his realm to ours." —Eris Morn

name: Heliopause Boots
flavor: We'll walk if we have to.

name: Immanent War Boots
flavor: Tear through chaos. Leave it in ash.

name: Infinite Lines Boots
flavor: Every time I look, the Darkness just grows larger." —RECORD 345-CHASM-6736

name: Iron Breed Boots
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Companion Boots
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Boots
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Jackknife
flavor: The programmable soles mimic the tracks of local wildlife.

name: Justicar's Boots
flavor: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
flavor: I am a KALI-GNT CHARRINGTON TACTICAL TREAD. What's on your mind?

name: Kallipolis Boots
flavor: A City is only as strong as its leader.

name: Kellhunter's Path
flavor: A strong Kell's power is like the wind: swift, howling and everywhere at once.

name: Komarov
flavor: Traditionally inscribed with a list: Komarov, Grissom, White, Chaffee and more. Souls lost to a higher purpose.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "He said he was determined to make it to Alpha Centauri. That was the last we ever saw him."

name: Mangala Skin
flavor: The Martian surface offers no solace to the lost. Guardians must move swiftly and be watchful.

name: Neuroghast
flavor: Unmyelinated fieldweave doesn't actually strengthen your body—just makes it feel invincible.

name: Order's Boots
flavor: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

name: Prime Zealot Greaves
flavor: Skinned in the membranes of the Hezen Vex. There is very little risk they will become permanently attached to your body.

name: Prototype
flavor: Your Ghost built this wire armor from available mass. It handles life support, but little else.

name: Queen's Guard Boots
flavor: Carry yourself lightly, and with pride.

name: Radiant Dance Machines
flavor: Built for swift movement, they provide unexpected and decisive social benefits.

name: Raku Vindicator
flavor: A notable triumph in the ongoing sartorial struggle.

name: Rogue
flavor: Never hurts to carry a spare.

name: Rustburner
flavor: Cabal tactics must be countered by aggressive maneuver and concentration of force. Remain agile.

name: Sanction Custom
flavor: The key to success is destroying the enemy's ability to process and react.

name: Sanction Six
flavor: Aerospace assets are valuable. We'll walk from here.

name: Sinaa Jaguar
flavor: If the enemy flees, run them down. If the enemy strikes back, reposition. Speed is always the answer.

name: Sinaa Lamprey
flavor: Auto-pressurized joints let agile Hunters move at top speeds.

name: Snakeline
flavor: A Hunter's bootprints mark the outer edge of civilization.

name: Sojourn Boots
flavor: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Stratus
flavor: Whether the weapon is a rifle or a blade, the kill demands positioning. Know your ground.

name: Takanome Ranger
flavor: "You couldn't get far on one life alone. Not in those days." —Chiyoko Mey

name: Tireless Striders
flavor: If there is no road, then it cannot be long.

name: Tracker
flavor: "Play with the fit and the sensors until it feels like going barefoot." - Handbook of (Un)Controversial Advice

name: Treads of the Pariah
flavor: "To know true color, you must first know Darkness." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Vaquero
flavor: Giddyup.

name: Vermilion Stripe
flavor: Sooner or later, every Hunter dons the vermilion stripe.

name: Warden's Path
flavor: "Yeah, I've been to the treasure room. I think it's about time the Awoken took some of that loot and paid for an elevator." —Cayde-6

name: Watchers' Boots
flavor: "Light burns. Light heals. Light blinds. Light reveals." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Winged Sun Legs
flavor: "Feet alone cannot take us to where we're going." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Wolf Pelt Weave
flavor: "I have ten more sets just like this."

name: Raku Poltergeist 2.0
flavor: Crucible variant. Padded with light and durable diamond foam.

name: KD Bogatyr 2.0
flavor: "I'm depending on you, Guardian. Wouldn't want me to get bored, would you?" —Cayde-6

name: High Command Boots
flavor: Rise above the noise. Take the throne.

name: Eon Tracer Boots
flavor: "I feel like every time I find the thread it slips through my fingers." —RECORD-448-CHASM-6565

name: Endling Strides
flavor: We are endangered, but we can save ourselves.

name: Nanomania Boots
flavor: Nearly any problem a deep-space colonist could have, SIVA can fix. ~SIVA.MEM.WB005

name: Lion's Vigil Strides
flavor: "The challenge will come when you least expect it. You must be ready." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Iron Saga Boots
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Dream-Eater Strides
flavor: "'No rest for the wicked,' they used to say. Now, they say the same about Hunters."

name: Days of Iron Boots
flavor: "When the Iron Temple's fires were lit again, who came to stand before its hearth?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Fr0st-EE5
flavor: "Hey, if it works for computers…" —Marcus Ren

name: Boots of Triumph
flavor: You've blazed your own path into legend.
